title: The Honeymoon
creator_credit: Laurel Whitcroft (Allen) and ACMI Digital Storytelling
brief_description: My family has a tradition of holidaying at Mt Buffalo Chalet, that has continued through four generations. A family album of the holidays in the Victorian Alps taken initially by Laurel and her husband for their honeymoon, then the subsequent returns by the growing family throughout the decades.
